title: Carrot Muffins
description: Sweet and moist inside with a twist of bitterness from orange jam topping
story: It's rather an autumn desert with warm flavours of cinnamon and nutmeg, but I wanted to share it here now to remember how good it was. </br></br>I think it would be good with pecan nuts and rasins added to the batter, unfortunately I didn't have enough this time.

ingredients.name: kefir
ingredients.preparationNotes: I take one with vanilla flavour
orange jam, crushed roasted pecan nuts, brown sugar, cinnamon for topping

instructions: In a small bowl mix kefir with baking powder, add it to eggs mixture
Add olive oil, maple syrup, vanila extract and finely grated carrots, mix all well.
In a separate bowl mix dry ingredients: sifted flour, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg.
Add dry ingredients to eggs-kefir-oil mixture.
Pour the batter to muffin tin (I use cupcakes paper baking cups).
For the topping: roast pecan nuts, crush them and mix with brown sugar and cinnamon.
Brush the top of muffins with an orange jam (I take one with orange peel). I make 12 muffins out of this amount of ingredients.
Sprinkle with roasted nuts and sugar mixture.
